text:
[Verse]
Streetlights shine bright
Under the pale moonlight
Echoes call my name
In this lonely game

[Verse 2]
Footsteps on the ground
Lost but now I'm found
City hums a tune
Stars will meet me soon

[Chorus]
Feel the rhythm rise
In these city skies
Dancing till it's dawn
Till the night is gone

[Verse 3]
Shadows fade away
Waiting for the day
Heartbeats in the dark
Like a fleeting spark

[Bridge]
Can you hear the sound
Magic all around
Stay beside me here
Night will disappear

[Chorus]
Feel the rhythm rise
In these city skies
Dancing till it's dawn
Till the night is gone
title: Echoes of the Night
